actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to create a pollution control financing program for small businesses.

summary.text: Provides that whenever the Small Business Administration determines that small business concerns are or are likely to be at an operational or financing disadvantage with other business concerns with respect to the planning, design, or installation of pollution control facilities, or the obtaining of private financing therefor, it may guarantee the payment of rentals or other amounts due under qualified contracts, and any such guarantee shall be for the full amount of the payments due under such qualified contract.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to create a pollution control financing program for small businesses.
